creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Panel of taupe satin brocade. The design includes two medallions containing religious symbols in upper right and left corners. Cranes, bats,, sprays of plum blossom, pine and two spotted deer in lower right and left corners. In lower center a gold cloud, from which spring peony blossoms above a line of rolling waves. Colors include shades of blue, green, pink, red, and yellow, as well as gold threads. Border of faded plum satin embroidered with blossoms and symbols in shades of blue and white. Piece made of two sections seamed up the middle and lined with thin peach-colored silk.
title: Panel
